browser.browserWarning: Unfortunately your browser does not support all options for creating this product. Please install Safari, Chrome, Firefox or a newer version of Internet Explorer (10 or higher) and start again, or continue with limited options.

features.reducedFeatures: Welcome to the Albelli Creator Tool for Personalised Calendars.  Drag and drop your photos, background, and add events and Public Holidays!  More themes and features available in our Creator Tool for desktop and laptop computers.

errors.errorBootstrapping: We're sorry, but a problem occurred during start-up. Please try again later or contact customer service for help.
errors.countryList: We're sorry, but a problem occurred during start-up. Please try again later or contact customer service for help. (couldn't retrieve country list)
errors.lowMemoryWarning: Your device seems to be running low on memory. Please close any other open applications and try again.

errors.loadPhotoBitmapData: We're sorry, but a problem occurred while trying to load your photo. Please try again later or contact customer service for help.
errors.loadBigPhoto: An error occurred while loading the photo. Please reduce the dimensions to a maximum of 8000 x 8000 pixels and try again.

errors.startUploadPhoto: An error occurred while initialising the photo upload. Contact the helpdesk or try again later.

errors.getPaymentUrl: An error occurred while retrieving the payment details. Contact the helpdesk or try again later.
